Reference

All functions

add_scorerWeights_to_criteriaTree()

Add weights of a scorer to criteria tree

add_weights()

Add weights to a data frame for weighted estimates

add_weights_to_criteriaTree()

Add weights to criteria tree

aggregate_estimates_by_criterion()

Aggregate estimates by criterion

aggregate_estimates_by_criterionCluster()

Aggregate estimates by criterion clusters (parent criteria)

aggregate_estimates_by_decision()

Aggregate the (potentially weighted) estimates by decision

build_weighted_estimate_df()

Build a dataframe for weighted estimates

cat0()

Concatenate to screen without spaces

combine_weights_and_criteria()

Add weights from a data frame to criteria tree and update data frame

compute_best_alternatives() compute_worst_alternatives()

Copute the worst and best alternatives

compute_scores_per_alternative()

Compute the scores per alternative

confidence_based_sensitivity_analysis()

Conduct a sensitivity analysis based on confidence scores

create_labelDf()

Create data frame with identifiers and labels

criteriaCluster_df()

Create a data frame with scores per criteria cluster per scenario

criteriaCluster_df_perAlternative()

Create a data frame with scores per criteria cluster per alternative

get_alternativeLabel()

Get the alternative labels based on a data frame

highlighted_alternative_table()

Create a scenario overview with highlighted alternatives

insert_if_knitting_to_html()

Insert text only if knitting to HTML

insert_if_knitting_to_pdf()

Insert text only if knitting to pdf

opts

Options for the mdmcda package

performanceSubtable_from_estimates() all_performanceSubtables_from_estimates()

Produce one or more 'clean' performance subtables

performanceTable_heatmap()

Create a performance table heatmap

plot_criteria()

Produce a DiagrammeR plot and show it and/or convert to SVG

process_confidences()

Process the confidence scores and create plots

rbind_dfs()

Simple alternative for rbind.fill or bind_rows

rbind_df_list()

Bind lots of dataframes together rowwise

read_estimates_from_xl()

Repeat a string a number of times

scenario_alternative_table()

Create a scenario overview with the selected alternatives

scenario_overview()

Create an object with various useful data frames and plots for a scenario

Create a bar chart with scores per criterion

Create a bar chart with scores per criteria cluster

scoreBarchart_criteriaCluster_by_alternative()

Create a bar chart with scores per criteria cluster for every alternative in a decision

Create a bar chart with scores per criterion for one alternative

scoreBarchart_decisions()

Create a bar chart with scores per decision

scoreBarchart_scenariosByCluster()

Get the aggregated scores for each scenario

set_postsets()

Set postsets

vecTxt() vecTxtQ()

Easily parse a vector into a character value
